chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Nature of Pain
chapters.info: Barasine, p. 66—Lanky Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah who approached Logain before he proclaimed himself. She did a lot of the talking in Javindhra's group. She was one of the sisters who captured Egwene, and she is now one of those charged with guarding her and dosing her with forkroot tea.
